name: Rogues Vs. Robots
description:
A rogue, a druid, a barbarian, and a sorcerer have all journeyed to the future where they encounter hostile robots.  

Rogues vs. Robots is a turn based strategy combat prototype.

Each combatant gets two actions per round. The order for the game is decided by an automated intitative roll. Use the UI buttons to select your players actions.

During your turn use WASD to move the camera, and E,Q to rotate. ESC to exit.

Defeat all four Robots to win!

**Warning. this is a prototype only. Your mileage may vary. Bugs probably exist**
